attributes.action: Restrict the sale of weapons clearly designed to cause injury or death
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a array of very vicious looking weapons which are obviously designed for nothing else but causing maximum damage to the body. While it is clearly unrealistic to ban all knives as many are just household items, these fighting knives should be banned from sale in UK. Also their import must be made illegal as I have seen them on sale in other countries. Knives are just as deadly as guns
